post.text: The FBI is actively and aggressively pursuing and investigating the Clinton Foundation's alleged "Pay to Play."

comment.author: Margaret
comment.text: Why is this crooked liar still able to run for POTUS? 😡 Just the fact that she's under federal investigation should disqualify her. Put her away already!😡

replies.author: Trevor
replies.text: Well we don't make the rules. Also don't hate the player... this nation will know the next leader soon.

replies.author: Katelynn
